lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Bob McDonnell has not met the legal standard that would warrant allowing him to remain free while he appeals his corruption convictions to the Supreme Court.

headline.main: Virginia: Solicitor General Opposes McDonnell Freedom
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Solicitor General Opposes Mcdonnell Freedom

snippet: Former Gov. Bob McDonnell has not met the legal standard that would warrant allowing him to remain free while he appeals his corruption convictions to the Supreme Court.
